feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud

entry.title: Activate Account Assignment Objects Configuration for Asset Posting in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi all, 

I know there is a setting to activate the additional account assignment object for asset accounting in SAP OP system.
But I couldn't find the same configuration in SAP Public Cloud.

I'd like to post depreciation to WBS element.
Does anyone know whether this configuration is available in SAP Public Cloud?  If so, could you please let me know where to find it?
Thank you.

entry.title: Unable to Deploy RAP application into Fiori launchpad in SAP public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have created a custom RAP application in Eclipse using a development tenant. The application is working fine in the service binding preview and is showing data correctly.

However, I am facing an issue when trying to deploy this RAP application to the Fiori Launchpad. I am unsure about the correct steps to make it available in the launchpad in the SAP Public Cloud (3-System Landscape).

Has anyone faced the same issue and successfully deployed a RAP application to the Fiori Launchpad? Any guidance or step-by-step instructions would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

Regards,
Sanjay

entry.title: Description" field
entry.content:
Hello,

I’m working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I would like to make the "Description" field (item description) read-only in the Purchase Order interface.

Is it possible to achieve this using the Custom Fields and Logic app, a BADI, or through Adapt UI?

If anyone has implemented a similar restriction or can suggest the best approach, I’d really appreciate your help.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: EXECUTION MODEL 347
entry.content:
Hello,

In SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition, I'm trying to run Form/ model 347 (Spain), but I can't do it, and I don't know if I'm in the right application, since the options to create a new Form/ model 347 run don't appear there.

Could someone help me with this, please?

Thank you.

Best regards,

Ismael.

entry.title: Issue with Cost Center linked to incorrect Profit Center in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL, CBC)
entry.content:
Dear SAP community,

We are working with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL, CBC) and created a cost center ES015393 in the Manage Cost Centers Fiori app. During its creation, it was accidentally linked to the wrong profit center ES015394.

SAP Support advised us to:

  • Create a new cost center and link it to the correct profit center. 

  • Align the valid-from date of the new cost center with the valid-to date of the incorrect one. 

However, this did not resolve the issue.

Problem:

When creating new asset postings for the corrected cost center, we face the error: “Cost center has different profit centers; therefore it cannot be used.”

This happens when creating a fixed asset and filling the cost center field in the Manage Fixed Assets app. According to SAP Support, the only current alternative is to create different cost centers for each profit center and use those in Asset Accounting (AA).

Challenge:

Each cost center/profit center represents one of our locations. Our cost center structure is integrated across our organization (HR system, CRM, etc.). Creating a completely new cost center number is not a feasible option.

References checked:

  • Asset Accounting – Time-Dependent Master Data (SAP Help)

  • SAP Note 3576469 – Error message ‘Cost center has different profit centers’

Question:
Has anyone faced this or a similar scenario before? If so, how did you resolve it while keeping the cost center structure intact?

 

Thanks in advance for your support!

 

Best Regards,


Mike van Ingen
Finance

entry.title: The amount of activity type is not correct and how to allocate actual cost of activity type
entry.content:
Hi Team,

In Manage my timesheet, I created an activity type (Service-Time) for WBS DG_S_2500021,

 

And maintained the cost rate, 100USD/Hour for cost center 170D100.

 

And recorded 8hours on relevant WBS

 

Suppose the amount  of Service-Time should be 800 USD. But I found it’s 360USD in project- actual report.

 

I have 2 questions, 

a.why the amount was not the one I expected, if I missed something?

b, the secondary cost element associated with activity type(service-time) should be Zero in month end, based on accounting point of view. what need to do to make the balance of 94308100 to became Zero.

Thanks

entry.title: Update the status to “Sent to bank” in the Monitor Payments application - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts, good afternoon.

We are currently implementing scope item 2YM for the automatic payment process. This API allows integration with CPI so that the file can then be sent to the bank. Likewise, the payment formats used are customized Z formats due to the requirement.

On the other hand, the SAP BCM solution is not being used in its entirety due to cost issues.

API Implemented

My question is as follows:

- How do I update the following statuses: “Sent to Bank,” “Completed” in the following application?

- Is there a BADI, Custom Logic, API, or missing configuration that allows me to update the statuses?

Thank you very much.

I look forward to any support and/or recommendations.

Best regards,

entry.title: There is no function to batch upload using an Excel file in the Debit/Credit Material function.
entry.content:
Dear ALL,

We are in an environment where we use standard costs for all materials during the month and perform actual cost calculations for the previous month in the following month.
Therefore, we plan to migrate the initial stock quantity using migration cockpit on the 1st of the system opening month and migrate the actual value
of initial stock through Debit/Credit Material in the middle of the opening month.
However, the problem is that there is no function to batch upload using an Excel file in the Debit/Credit Material function.
For companies in our environment, I would like to know how to migrate the actual amount of initial stock.

Thank you,

Su Young

entry.title: API for Commodity code in s4 public cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have a customer requirement to create commodity codes in S4 Public Cloud using external software. The customer’s system is capable of creating products along with commodity codes, however, in S4 this process occurs in a different place.

From what I have reviewed, the standard integration does not support commodity code creation. Could you please advise if there is any alternate approach to create and classify commodity codes in S4—perhaps through a program, extension, or workaround?

Your guidance on the best possible solution will be highly appreciated

Regards

Janarthanan

SAP S/4HANA Global Trade Management

entry.title: Printing of HU_shipping label
entry.content:
Hi,

Requirement is pack goods to shipping-HU and get HU_shipping label printout after goods have been packed. The label should be printed out after goods have been packed to HU automatically. Is the trigger of printing possible with APIs? Now the HU label is printed already when  the HU is created, so the printing happen too early.

entry.title: Implementation Status Issues Related to 2508 Upgrade?
entry.content:
I see accounts in P system that have implementation status I, despite implementation status P in dev system. These issues started soon after the 2508 upgrade.

entry.title: Success Factor ecp to S4H Public Cloud Integration
entry.content:
In S4H we have only one Controlling Area A000 and in Sucess Factor Payroll we have multiple Controlling areas

While Using PA20 in ECP the system is checking with S4H config which are related to Controlling Area, 

Ask is how to handle this cases , i mean while with S4H the the system should check One Controlling Area , Mapping needs to be done where we can do Mapping 

Ex    S4H - A000 and ECP  we have 1000,2000,3000 all these needs to be mapped to A000 while checking in the S4H

entry.title: Class for each equipment or product cannot be assigned, as there is no template or mass change avail
entry.content:
Hi everyone, If got an issue about classes here is the Problem:

  1. Products are created to be able to record in SAP the equipment that our company maintains (30000 is the order of magnitude). We identified that around 3000 products should be created in order to assign the equipment. But as all the fields from SAP Cloud Public are not enough to classify each product, we defined the classes and the characteristics that are suitable (type:300 different values, brand: 400 different values, model: 3000 different values).
  2. 3000 products are migrated without classes/characteristics.
  3. 30000 equipment are migrated without classes/characteristics.
  4. The classes and characteristics are migrated to classify the products and the equipment.
  5. And here is the problem : the value of each class for each equipment or product cannot be assigned, as there is no template or mass change available in migration cockpit.

Can someone provide me with a solution to this problem?

Best regards 

Simon

entry.title: Extension Point for Custom Logic for EWM Outbound Delivery in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

I am looking for a possibility to enhance EWM Outbound Delivery with own fields, but found no suitable Business Context and no Extension Point for it.

Does anyone know how to add own field (and fill it by custom logic or BAdI) to print it on Loading List.

entry.title: Customer electronic invoicing (B2G) Spain - Add custom fields to XML
entry.content:
Hello experts, 

Regarding electronic invoicing (B2G) in Spain, an XML file is generated in a standard format, but we need to include additional information in the XML using new nodes.

We’ve seen here: Mapping Fields to the XML File | SAP Help Portal that it’s possible to map new fields to the XML, but we need to include several fields that don’t seem to be supported through this method (such as a date, which we considered covering with a custom field created by us).

Is there any way—via BAdI, BAPI, or another method—to incorporate new nodes into the XML?

Thank you very much.

entry.title: Rejection EDocument Cockpit
entry.content:
Hello,

When I create a complementary customs settlement invoice with indicator code D7, which is the SAP standard, when the e-document is created, it is rejected:

"Error: 1271 - The NumSerieFacturaEmisor field does not comply with the format for complementary customs settlements"

I enter both the reference code and header correctly, which is why I don't understand the reason for the eDocument rejection.

I look forward to your response or any possible solution. Thank you very much.

Best regards
